Candidate which is conducted by the Company on behalf of the Client in accordance with an agreed written Recruitment Proposal and defined fee structure therein


Contract 

These Terms constitute the entire contract between the Company

Agreement
The Client agrees that the Company

To provide the Company with a copy of any offer of an Engagement immediately it is made to the Candidate   
To notify the Company immediately an Engagement is accepted 
To pay to the Company

To pay Value Added Tax on the Fee where due 
To pay the Fee in sterling unless previously agreed in writing by a Director of the Company
The request must be made in writing and following written acknowledgement of the request by the Company
For the purposes of this clause the Company
Johnston Vere Consultancy Ltd
The Stage Two invoice shall be raised by the Company

To ensure that the Candidate is aware of any requirements to be satisfied in respect of the Engagement 
    
Liability
The Company
The Stage Three invoice shall be raised by the Company
Client by the Company
Client engages any employees of the Company
In the event that any payments due to the Company

The Client agrees  
To pay to the Company
If the Company
Advertisement Any advertising fees incurred by the Company
The Client shall notify the Company
Client shall be liable to pay the Company

Payment Terms
For all services provided by the Company
The Stage One invoice shall be raised by the Company
Candidate which is conducted by the Company

Contingency Placement Fees
The Contingency Fee
If the Client has not instructed the Company
Fee payable to the Company

Client by the Company and that they have been actively considering them for the position concerned then the introduction shall be deemed to have been made by the Company and a Fee shall be payable by the Client to the Company
Engagement prior to commencing employment and the Company
Candidate to the Client as a direct or indirect result of an introduction by the Company
Annual Remuneration paid by the Company
Client will pay to the Company
Director of the Company

Fees
If the Company
Where the amount of the actual Annual Remuneration is not known the Company
Terms shall be valid unless agreed in writing between a Director of the Company
Company seeking the Candidate for the Client or the introduction by the Company

England and the parties accept the jurisdiction of the English Courts

Waiver
No time or indulgence granted by the Company shall operate as a waiver of the Company

Company recovering any debt on a full indemnity basis
Not to employ or seek to employ any of the Company
Introduction and the Client shall be liable to pay to the Company
The Company

Search If the Client wishes the Company
text_sample:
Johnston Vere Consultancy Ltd
RECRUITMENT CONSULTANCY

Terms and Conditions  

Definitions
“Annual Remuneration” means the basic salary plus any bonuses, commission, benefits in kind or any other remuneration, any regional or other weighting allowances and/or any other taxable allowances and/or any other payments due to the Candidate in connection with the Engagement for a period of 12 months.
“The Candidate” means any person, partnership or corporate body introduced to the Client by the Co...
